* Apps Bug fixed

# New Major Release:
* Added many new languages!
* Small UI changes all over BaldPhone
* Added option to customize the HomeScreen

* Fixed critical bug in recent calls, thanks aha!
* UI changes in recent calls and in the dialer, thanks yoni!

* Added Chinese and Russian, Thanks Thomas and Vintic!
* Fixed multiple bugs in Recent Calls

* Fixed bugs
* Added Polish translations! Thank you Qik!
* Added option to remove SOS button
* Added send sms button in recents

* Fixed 3 small bugs
* Added Italian Translations, thanks Dario Mastromattei!
* Added Brazilian Portuguese Translations, thanks Kellyson Antunes!
* UI change in Dialer
* Added Donate Button

* Added Slovenian translations! Thank you Klemen Skerbiš!
* Added Greek translations! Thank you Zafeiris Ganas!
* Fixed some small bugs

* Added Spanish Translations! Thank you Victor Arribas
* Added Czech Translations! Thank you Tadeáš Horák
* Fixed USSD bug

* Added Portuguese translations! Thank you Vladyslav Rudakevych!
* Added low battery alert in the status bar
* Added indication to notifications
* Fixed some bugs

* Fixed a bug in alarms
* Fixed a bug in the home screen
* Added sounds to dialer (can be turned off in the settings)
* many improvements to the keyboard

* Fixed a bug on new devices
* Fixed german translations
* Added German translations! thank you @Caibot

* Bug fixes
* Server Test 1
Publishing BaldPhone to F-Droid!

Added two new video tutorials
Releasing on F-Droid!

new feature - Badges!
few small bugs fixed

New Updating Mechanism
First release via Releases, a test of the new automatic updating mechanism.
